Snowball (Temporary name)

Windows, Mac, Linux - TBD

Snowball (temporary name)
Snowball is a little game where you need to protect your car from some nasty snowmen. You will be able to kill them with your "Snowball-Gun". A Single-Player and a Co-op (splitscreen) mode will be available.

Status of the project
This game is currently in development but it will be soon available on Windows/Mac and Linux.
